BathroomBin: ^<color=#ffffffff>It's a bathroom bin, looks simple enough...
^<color=#ffffffff>Oh wait, no, there is something shiny inside.
^<color=#ffffffff>Taking a closer look, you find a lighter. What's that doing here?
^<color=#ffffffff>Maybe you could use the lighter on the Manga book?
YesBurn: ^<color=#ffffffff>Taking the lighter into your hands, you run your thumb quickly along the sparkwheel down to the fork.
^<color=#ffffffff>Carefully, you bring the edge of one of the mangas to the flame.
^<color=#ffffffff>The fire attached itself to the book right as the lighter went out. Must of ran out of juice.
^<color=#ffffffff>You use the current flame on the other two books before putting them on the ground.
^<color=#ffffffff>You stood there, watching the flames dance the paper with burns in it's wake.
^<color=#ffffffff>After sometime, you stepped down on the books to get rid of the fire, thankfully no smoke alarms went off.
^<color=#ffffffff>You have successfully acquired three burnt Manga books!
